ca.corefacility.gview.managers

Class LayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.managers.LayoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject, java.util.EventListener

    public class LayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject
    Handles anything relating to layout (mainly the Backbone/SlotPath objects).
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau
